Cascadia R Jamboree

June 3, 2017, OHSU Collaborative Life Science Building - Portland, OR


What is it?

A single track series of talks, ranging from beginner to advanced applications. Lots of opportunities for questions and a workshop style atmosphere in combination with traditional talks.
